QuestionJSON.Question:
Justice is working on a school lab computer. Justice moves the computer mouse - (a) - which sends electronic signals that are interpreted by the computer operating system - (b) . The operating system uses these electronic signals to move the cursor on the monitor to the OK button.

Which of the following provides the best answers for (a) and (b)?
QuestionJSON.Explanation: A computer mouse is hardware as it has physical components. A computer operating system (e.g., Microsoft Windows) is software as it provides instructions to a computer and does not have any specific physical components associated with it.
